838020.name: Road Scars: Origins - Original Soundtrack
838020.description:
The Road Scars: Origins - Original Soundtrack is a collection of 7 awesome original tracks (including 2 versions of each looped and complete) plus a trailer song from the great brazilian composer Derek Volker!


Dont Wanna be on a Snuff
Amidat Motza
Bleeding Soul
Djabo
Jumpy
Makot Egrof Esmol-Yamin
Not a Table
Obviously this is Not a Normal Engine Noise
Amidat Motza (looped)
Bleeding Soul (looped)
Djabo (looped)
Jumpy (looped)
Makot Egrof Esmol-Yamin (looped)
Not a Table (looped)
Obviously this is Not a Normal Engine Noise (looped)

You can access the musics on the folder "//steamapps\common\Road Scars Origins\Soundtrack"
838020.supported_languages: 英语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
